SEARCH
Package org.attribyte.snook.auth

Class CORSAuthenticator

java.lang.Object
org.attribyte.snook.auth.CORSAuthenticator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Authenticator<Boolean>
public class CORSAuthenticator extends Object implements Authenticator<Boolean>
An authenticator for CORS (the Origin header value) that returns the authorized host as the username, if authorized.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • CORSAuthenticator

      public CORSAuthenticator(Properties props)
      Creates origin auth from properties.
      Parameters:
      props - The properties.

    • CORSAuthenticator

      public CORSAuthenticator(Collection<String> denyDomain, Collection<String> denyHost, Collection<String> allowDomain, Collection<String> allowHost, boolean secureOriginRequired, String allowHeaders, String allowMethods, String maxAgeSeconds, String exposeHeaders)
      Creates the origin auth.
      Parameters:
      denyDomain - A set of domains to deny.
      denyHost - A set of hosts to deny.
      allowDomain - A set of domains to allow.
      allowHost - A set of hosts to allow.
      secureOriginRequired - Must the origin be secure?
      allowHeaders - A comma-separated list of headers to allow.
      allowMethods - A comma-separated list of methods to allow.
      maxAgeSeconds - The maximum age in seconds for pre-flight requests.
      exposeHeaders - A comma-separated list of headers to expose.

    • authorizeRequest

      public String authorizeRequest(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, Set<CORSAuthenticator.Option> options)
      Authorize (or not) a CORS request. May be a "simple" request or the response to a pre-flight request.
      Parameters:
      request - The request.
      response - The response.
      options - The CORS options.
      Returns:
      The authorized host or null if not authorized.
